name: Squeek VS Space
description:
Summary
Squeek VS Space is a dungeon crawler, you are a lil dino mouse and you were captured. Now you have to escape, but obviously your abductors will not let this happen. You are stuck with your massive metal ball, but you can use this to your advantage. Use it to smash away enemies!

How to play

WASDMoveMouseAimLeft mouse buttonShootRight mouse button (Hold and release)Charged ShotExit gameALT+F4

GMTK Game Jam 2021
The game was originally thought out during GMTK Game Jam 2021. But unfortunately we encountered building issues, and could not upload it on time. But this is the original Game Jam version untouched.

Team:

Programmers:
Jannick Schalkwijk
Jonah Rutten

Designer:
